articles.title: Astro-photographer Shares Stunning Photo of Mars at its Closest to Earth, Internet in Awe - News18
articles.description: Mars was at its closest to Earth on November 30, when an astro-photographer captured its stunning image and shared it online. Netizens were left completely amazed over the magnificent pic.
